resources.string:
Enter a date, clock-in, and clock-out times for a position and press the '+' button. 

The '$' button calculates total hours worked and estimated pay (before tax). 

To calculate hours and pay for another position, remove all the times entered by pressing the 'x' button.

Times are rounded as following:

0-7 minutes = 0.0
8-22 minutes = 0.25
23-37 minutes = 0.5
38-52 minutes = 0.75
53-60 minutes = 1.0

 Check all times entered for accuracy.

Icons are courtesy of www.icons8.com
